title: Did he know that he had been detained after he revealed to us in the holy white part of the Kingdom?
subtitle: Judy Mikovich did not discover a deadly virus delivered through vaccines; she was arrested for stealing equipment belonging to the Institute, which expelled her.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Researcher Judy Mikovich was thrown into prison after refusing to question the research that led to the discovery that the deadly antiretroviral virus was transmitted through vaccines.
